title: A Double Murder: Episode 128
description:
Stansted Mountfitchet is a quiet, pretty Essex village of around 6,000 people 35 miles north of London and close to Stansted airport.  Not much happens here.  But on a summers evening in July 2015 a brutal double murder rocked the community.

In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast I look at exactly what happened.  And why.
